name: Montana's BBQ & Bar
address: Montana's, 20100 Langley Bypass, Langley City, BC V3A 9J7, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Oven-Baked Antojitos
hasMenuItem.description: Montana's signature starter. Cheese, jalapeño, onion and red pepper, rolled in a tortilla and baked 'til it all melts together. Served with pesto sour cream.

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Back Ribs - Full Rack
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly prepared and smoked in-house daily, Montana's is your home for authentic BBQ ribs. Coated in Montana's signature rib rub, slow smoked over hickory chips and then fire grilled to order. Hungry yet? Served with freshly baked cornbread, seasoned fries and your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw.

hasMenuItem.name: KAPOW! Shrimp
hasMenuItem.description: Breaded jalapeño popcorn shrimp, deep-fried and then tossed in our signature KAPOW! sauce - a combo of creamy garlic, tangy thai chili, fresh cilantro and lime juice.

hasMenuItem.name: Creamy Mac 'n Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Spiral pasta smothered in a cheesy white wine cream sauce, baked in a skillet until golden brown and crispy. Served with freshly baked cornbread.  Add Crispy Bacon | Add Buffalo Chicken

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Back Ribs - Taster Plate
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly prepared and smoked in-house daily, Montana's is your home for authentic BBQ ribs. Coated in Montana's signature rib rub, slow smoked over hickory chips and then fire grilled to order. Hungry yet? Served with freshly baked cornbread, seasoned fries and your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw.

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Back Ribs - Half Rack
hasMenuItem.description: Freshly prepared and smoked in-house daily, Montana's is your home for authentic BBQ ribs. Coated in Montana's signature rib rub, slow smoked over hickory chips and then fire grilled to order. Hungry yet? Served with freshly baked cornbread, seasoned fries and your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw.

hasMenuItem.name: Honkin' Beef Rib
hasMenuItem.description: A big, beefy rib slow-smoked to mouthwatering perfection. Grilled with your choice of BBQ sauce. Served with seasoned fries and choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw. Comes with freshly baked cornbread.

hasMenuItem.name: Smokehouse Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: Tender grilled seasoned chicken breast, crispy bacon, seasoned rice, diced tomatoes, green onion and cheddar cheese, drizzled with our garlic BBQ sauce, wrapped in a tortilla and oven baked.

hasMenuItem.name: Double Dusted Chicken Wings 8 pieces
hasMenuItem.description: Dusted twice and cooked to a crispy finish. Try 'em sauced up just how you like 'em. Served with your choice of dipping sauce and carrot sticks.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Pulled Pork Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: In-house slow smoked pork, cooked until it falls apart and then tossed in Apple Butter BBQ sauce. Served on an ACE Bakery® bun and topped with creamy coleslaw.

hasMenuItem.name: Buttermilk Fried Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Tender seasoned chicken marinated in buttermilk and hand-tossed in our signature breading. Served over garlic mashed potatoes, a side of fresh veggies, freshly baked cornbread and topped with country-style gravy.

hasMenuItem.name: Double Dusted Chicken Wings 16 pieces
hasMenuItem.description: Dusted twice and cooked to a crispy finish. Try 'em sauced up just how you like 'em. Served with your choice of dipping sauce and carrot sticks.

hasMenuItem.name: Double surf your turf - 10oz
hasMenuItem.description: Tender, juicy 10oz top sirloin, aged for 50 days, seasoned to perfection, and fire-grilled to order. Elevated to a whole new level of deliciousness with a 3oz Canadian lobster tail cooked with garlic butter and smoked paprika and two shrimp skewers. Served with two onion rings, your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw, and your choice of seasoned fries, house salad, or baked potato. *Cannot guarantee steak doneness for take-out.

hasMenuItem.name: Lobster Mac N' Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Spiral pasta in a cheesy white wine lobster cream sauce, 2oz tender lobster meat, baked in a skillet until golden brown. Served with our freshly baked cornbread.

hasMenuItem.name: Lobster Four-Cheese Spinach Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Our famous four cheese spinach dip blended with 2oz of tender Canadian lobster meat to bring even more flavour! Served with lots of crispy pita and nacho chips.

hasMenuItem.name: Texas Trash Pie
hasMenuItem.description: A sweets lover's paradise! Chocolate chips, caramel bits, pretzels, graham crackers, coconut, pecans, and more are packed into this heavenly slice. Served with a drizzle of fudge sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Canadian Lobster Tail
hasMenuItem.description: Canadian Lobster Tail

hasMenuItem.name: 12oz Steak and 3oz Lobster Tail
hasMenuItem.description: Tender, juicy 12oz striploin, aged for 50 days, seasoned to perfection, and fire-grilled to order. Elevated to a whole new level of deliciousness with a Canadian lobster tail, cooked with garlic butter and smoked paprika. Served with two onion rings, your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw, and your choice of seasoned fries, house salad, or baked potato. *Cannot guarantee steak doneness for take-out.

hasMenuItem.description: Montana's® signature starter with a touch of surf- cheese, jalapeño, onion, and red pepper blended with 2oz of tender Canadian lobster meat, rolled in a tortilla, and baked 'til it all melts together. Served with sour cream.

hasMenuItem.description: Creamy lobster potato smashers

hasMenuItem.name: 12oz Striploin
hasMenuItem.description: This centre cut Striploin is for the real steak lovers out there. Seasoned in house for 8 hours and then grilled to order. Served with two onion rings, your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw and seasoned fries. *Cannot guarantee steak doneness for take-out.

Served with two onion rings, your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw, and your choice of seasoned fries, house salad, or baked potato. *Cannot guarantee steak doneness for take-out.

hasMenuItem.name: Steak Combo For Two
hasMenuItem.description: Two 100% 7 oz AAA Canadian Sirloins, aged for 50 days, seasoned to perfection and served each with your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw and choice of side. Finish it off on a sweet note with Shake'n Share donuts served with English toffee dipping sauce - perfect for two!

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Combo for Two
hasMenuItem.description: Winner winner, Chicken Dinner for two! Start things off with a delicious starter and then select two Chicken Entrees served with your choice of side.

hasMenuItem.name: Burger Combo for Two
hasMenuItem.description: It's a burger feast fit for two! Start things off with your choice of appetizer then move onto the main event with two of our signature burgers served with house seasoned fries!

hasMenuItem.name: Family BBQ Combo
hasMenuItem.description: Feed the whole family with a BBQ feast of your favourites. Begin with a starter then move onto the main event with a full rack of ribs, eight double dusted chicken wings, four sides of house seasoned fries and four pieces of cornbread.

hasMenuItem.name: Rib Combo for Two
hasMenuItem.description: Indulge in an all-out Rib extravaganza. Enjoy one of our signature starters, two plates of our fall-off-the-bone, slow-smoked pork back ribs sauced the way you like them served with house seasoned fries, your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw and cornbread!

hasMenuItem.description: Dusted twice and cooked to a crispy finish. Try 'em sauced up just how you like 'em. Served with your choice of dipping sauce and carrot sticks.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheese Nachos
hasMenuItem.description: Nachos topped with fresh diced tomatoes, green onions, jalapeños and melted cheese. Served with sour cream and salsa.

hasMenuItem.name: Pulled Pork Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy seasoned fries topped with in-house smoked pulled pork with apple butter BBQ sauce, cheese curds, beef gravy.

hasMenuItem.name: Beef Nachos
hasMenuItem.description: Nachos topped with beef, fresh diced tomatoes, green onions, jalapeños and melted cheese. Served with sour cream and salsa.

hasMenuItem.name: Delicious Deep Fried Pickles
hasMenuItem.description: Served with a Kickin' Ranch Dip.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Brisket Potato Skins
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy potato skins smothered in melted cheddar, in-house smoked beef brisket, Texas Bold BBQ sauce and green onion. Oven-baked until golden brown and served with sour cream.

hasMenuItem.name: BBQ Brisket Burnt Ends
hasMenuItem.description: A southern delicacy - tender low and slow in-house smoked BBQ beef brisket burnt ends served on a piece of Texas Toast, topped with shredded pickles and drizzled with an Alabama white BBQ sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Classic Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy seasoned fries loaded with cheese curds and beef gravy.

hasMenuItem.name: Tex Mex Fries
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy seasoned fries topped with seasoned nacho beef, cheese curds , shredded cheddar cheese,  guacamole, sour cream and salsa.

hasMenuItem.name: Double Bacon & Cheese Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy seasoned fries loaded with cheese curds, shredded cheddar cheese, strips of bacon, grilled peameal bacon and beef gravy.

hasMenuItem.name: KAPOW! Shrimp
hasMenuItem.description: Breaded jalapeño popcorn shrimp, deep-fried and then tossed in our signature KAPOW! sauce - a combo of creamy garlic, tangy thai chili, fresh cilantro and lime juice.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Nachos
hasMenuItem.description: Our Cajun grilled chicken breast topped with fresh diced tomatoes, green onions, jalapeños, and melted cheese. Served with sour cream and salsa.

hasMenuItem.name: 7 oz Sirloin
hasMenuItem.description: Tender, juicy Canadian AAA top sirloin - aged for 50 days, seasoned to perfection and fire-grilled to order. Served with two onion rings, your choice of in-house baked beans or coleslaw and seasoned fries. *Cannot guarantee steak doneness for take-out.

hasMenuItem.name: Smokehouse Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: Tender grilled seasoned chicken breast, crispy bacon, seasoned rice, diced tomatoes, green onion and cheddar cheese, drizzled with our garlic BBQ sauce, wrapped in a tortilla and oven baked.

hasMenuItem.name: Smoked Pulled Pork Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: In-house slow smoked pork, cooked until it falls apart and then tossed in Apple Butter BBQ sauce. Served on an ACE Bakery® bun and topped with creamy coleslaw.

hasMenuItem.name: Brisket Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Our juicy Canadian Angus burger sauced with Texas Bold BBQ sauce and topped with tender low & slow in-house smoked BBQ beef brisket, real cheddar cheese, crispy Cajun onions, leaf lettuce and chipotle ranch, served on a toasted ACE Bakery® bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Spicy Southern Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: In-house breaded, buttermilk fried chicken breast tossed in our in-house sweet and spicy Maple Habanero sauce and topped with chipotle ranch, creamy coleslaw, dill pickles and served on a toasted ACE Bakery® bun. Served with your choice of house salad or seasoned fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Austin Cheesesteak Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Our low & slow in-house smoked BBQ beef brisket chopped and smothered with our signature Texas Bold BBQ sauce, onions and peppers, and melted cheddar cheese. Finished with a drizzle of Alabama white BBQ sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Southern-Fried Chicken Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: In-house breaded, buttermilk fried seasoned chicken breast topped with chipotle ranch, creamy coleslaw, dill pickles, lettuce and served on a toasted ACE Bakery® bun.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Tacos
hasMenuItem.description: Two soft shell tacos packed with tender grilled seasoned chicken, cheddar cheese, crisp lettuce, red onions, diced tomatoes, crispy tortilla strips, fresh cilantro and lime juice. Finished off with a drizzle of our KAPOW! sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: BBQ Brisket Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Canadian Beef Brisket, topped with Texas Bold BBQ sauce, crispy Cajun onions, real cheddar cheese and served on a toasted ACE Bakery bun. Served with seasoned fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Canadian Burger EH!
hasMenuItem.description: Our juicy sirloin beef burger sauced with apple butter BBQ sauce and topped with peameal bacon, tomato, real cheddar cheese, and mayo all on a toasted ACE Bakery bun. Served with seasoned fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Chipotle Firecracker Burger
hasMenuItem.description: It's bursting with flavour! A juicy sirloin beef burger sauced with Chipotle Honey BBQ sauce, topped with bacon, crispy Cajun onions, real cheddar cheese, and crispy jalapeños served on a toasted ACE Bakery bun with seasoned fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Veggie Burger
hasMenuItem.description: Our veggie burger sauced with Apple Butter BBQ sauce and topped with sautéed peppers, onions and mushrooms, goat cheese, tomato and mayo all on a toasted ACE Bakery Bun . Served with seasoned fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Creamy Mac 'n Cheese
hasMenuItem.description: Spiral pasta smothered in a cheesy white wine cream sauce, baked in a skillet until golden brown and crispy. Served with freshly baked cornbread.  Add Crispy Bacon | Add Buffalo Chicken

hasMenuItem.name: Buttermilk Fried Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Tender seasoned chicken marinated in buttermilk and hand-tossed in our signature breading. Served over garlic mashed potatoes, a side of fresh veggies, freshly baked cornbread and topped with country-style gravy.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Club Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy romaine lettuce tossed in a buttermilk dill dressing and topped with cheddar cheese, maple bacon, green onions, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and seasoned croutons.

hasMenuItem.name: Two Piece Beer-Battered Fish & Chips
hasMenuItem.description: Two pieces of flaky white fish, beer-battered and cooked to a golden crisp. Served with tartar sauce, coleslaw and seasoned fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Burrito Bowl
hasMenuItem.description: Seasoned grilled chicken on a bed of rice, roasted corn, black beans, onions, tomatoes, cheese, red peppers, guacamole, house-made Pico de Gallo garnished with a creamy cilantro sauce and crunchy corn tortillas.

hasMenuItem.name: One Piece Beer-Battered Fish & Chips
hasMenuItem.description: One piece of flaky white fish, beer-battered and cooked to a golden crisp. Served with tartar sauce, coleslaw and seasoned fries.

hasMenuItem.name: Caesar Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy romaine lettuce served with a garlic Caesar dressing and topped with Parmesan cheese, croutons and bacon bits.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy romaine leaves tossed in a garlic Caesar dressing and topped with a grilled seasoned chicken breast, Parmesan cheese, croutons and bacon bits.

hasMenuItem.name: Club Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy Romaine lettuce tossed in a buttermilk dill dressing and topped with cheddar cheese, maple bacon, green onions, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and seasoned croutons.

hasMenuItem.name: Apple Pecan Harvest Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Goat cheese, red pepper strips, spicy pecans, apple slices and dried cranberries on a bed of mixed field greens served with balsamic vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.name: Chicken Apple Pecan Harvest Salad
hasMenuItem.description: Fire-grilled seasoned chicken breast, goat cheese, red pepper strips, spicy pecans, apple slices and dried cranberries on a bed of mixed field greens tossed in balsamic vinaigrette.

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Back Ribs
hasMenuItem.description: Three of our famous fall-off-the-bone pork ribs brushed with your choice of Signature BBQ sauce. Served with your choice of side and freshly baked chocolate chip cookie or wagon wheel.

hasMenuItem.name: Scoobi Doo Noodles
hasMenuItem.description: Scoobi Doo Noodles topped with your choice of cheesy alfredo or butter sauce. Served with toasted garlic bread and a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie or wagon wheel.

hasMenuItem.name: Cheesy Cheese Pizza
hasMenuItem.description: Oven-baked individual cheese pizza. Served with your choice of side and a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie or wagon wheel.

hasMenuItem.name: Kids Chicken Fingers
hasMenuItem.description: Three lightly breaded all white meat chicken strips served with your choice of side, dipping sauce and a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie or wagon wheel.

hasMenuItem.name: Kids Burger
hasMenuItem.description: 100% Canadian Sirloin Burger on an ACE bun, served with choice of side and a freshly baked chocolate chip cookie or wagon wheel.

hasMenuItem.name: Sweet Potato Fries & Chipotle Dip
hasMenuItem.description: Sweet Potato Fries & Chipotle Dip

hasMenuItem.name: French Fries
hasMenuItem.description: French Fries

hasMenuItem.name: Starter Caesar
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy romaine lettuce leaves tossing in garlicky Caesar dressing, topped with Parmesan cheese, croutons and bacon bits.

hasMenuItem.name: Poutine
hasMenuItem.description: Poutine

hasMenuItem.name: In-House Baked Cornbread
hasMenuItem.description: In-House Baked Cornbread

review.reviewBody: The Smoked Pulled Pork Sandwich could definitely use more pork and coleslaw but other then that it was amazing one of my favourites hands down.
another outstanding rib ,definitely worth it . highly recommended .Will be back for sure
beef rib was outstanding, cornbread a little dry but very good taste . overall very satisfied and would order again
Shouldn't be putting croutons on the house salads so ppl with gluten allergies can eat them.
The Honkin' Big Beef rib was self-indulgent, but I am worth it! 😋 Delicious!
